stateCompliance.headline: Understanding California Cash Advance Laws in Los Angeles
stateCompliance.content: Los Angeles residents are protected by California's strict payday loan regulations. The California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI) regulates all cash advance lenders to ensure fair lending practices.
keyPoints: Maximum loan amount is $300 including all fees
Maximum fee is 15% of the check amount (approximately 460% APR for 14-day loans)
You can only have one loan at a time - rollovers are prohibited
Lenders cannot threaten criminal prosecution for non-payment
All lenders must be licensed by DFPI - Lion Cash Advance is fully licensed
If a check bounces, lenders can only charge one $15 NSF fee
Clear written disclosures required in your preferred language
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general guidance only and may not reflect the most current legal developments. California cash advance laws are strictly enforced. For the most accurate and up-to-date information, contact the DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov. If you have specific legal questions, consult with a licensed California attorney.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Los Angeles Area Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Hollywood location? We also serve these nearby communities:

faq.question: Where is your Los Angeles location exactly?
faq.answer: We're located at 456 Hollywood Boulevard, Suite 100, right across from Griffith Observatory. Take I-10 to Exit 63 and follow signs toward Hollywood Boulevard. Easy parking available.

faq.question: How much can I borrow in Los Angeles?
faq.answer: California law limits payday loans to a maximum of $300 including all fees. With our standard 15% fee, you can borrow up to $255 in cash. The amount approved depends on your income.

faq.question: What's the fee for a cash advance in California?
faq.answer: California law caps payday loan fees at 15% of the check amount. For a $200 loan, the fee would be $30. For a $255 loan, the maximum fee is $45.

faq.question: Do you offer same-day funding in Los Angeles?
faq.answer: Yes! Apply in person at our Hollywood Boulevard location and most customers receive same-day funding. Bring a valid ID, proof of income, and an active checking account.

faq.question: Are you licensed to operate in California?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Lion Cash Advance is licensed by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI). You can verify our license at dfpi.ca.gov/regulated-industries/regulated-entities-list/
